output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes - CMF 11240002 is present at the end of the post, indicating this is electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate: Yes - Mentions "Nicolae Ciucă" who is a presidential candidate. However, it's important to note that this post appears to be primarily focused on parliamentary elections and PNL's general platform.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes - This is a paid Facebook/Instagram advertisement clearly targeting a wide audience, specifically mentioning Arad and Romania in general.
4. Electoral objective: Yes - The post clearly aims to influence voters with: - Direct calls to vote ("Votați PNL") - Promises of economic and social improvements - Presentation of leadership team and vision - Use of electoral slogans and hashtags
5. Journalism: No - This is clearly campaign material, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion: No - This is an official party communication with CMF number and structured campaign messaging
The post primarily focuses on parliamentary elections (which are still in the allowed campaign period) but does mention Nicolae Ciucă as president, which could be seen as presidential campaign content after the end of that campaign period.

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda as evidenced by: - Presence of CMF number - Direct calls to vote - Campaign promises - Official party messaging - Paid distribution While primarily focused on parliamentary elections (still allowed), it does include presidential campaign elements by mentioning Ciucă as president.
conclusion.message-for-police: Partidul Național Liberal (PNL), prin intermediul paginii "Ucu Dima", pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui material de propagandă electorală (ID postare Facebook: 1306460553865972) după încheierea perioadei de campanie pentru alegerile prezidențiale, respectiv după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul îl promovează explicit pe candidatul Nicolae Ciucă în contextul președinției, menționând "Cu Nicolae Ciucă Președinte", reprezentând astfel o continuare a propagandei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale după încheierea acesteia.
